english_translation: What is the final word, such that one can say, ""This is exactly it""?
This wave of time has continuously come forward.

kannada_original: ಚಿಂತನೆಯ ನಿಲುಗಡೆಗೆ ಇದೆ ಎಲ್ಲೋ ಒಂದು ಗಡಿ !
english_transliteration: Cintaneya nilugaḍege ide ellō ondu gaḍi !
english_translation: There is some limit somewhere for the stopping point of thought!

kannada_original: ಮುಕ್ತ ಮನ ಒಂದು ವರ – ಮುದ್ದು ರಾಮ.
english_transliteration: Mukta mana ondu vara – Muddu Rāma.
english_translation: A liberated mind is a boon – Muddu Rama.
